name: K. B. Garments
description: manufacture and supply an exquisite arr
overview:
K. B. Garments came into being in the year 2004 and proved its competency as the known manufacturer and supplier of the wide range of School Uniform Blazers, School Uniform Shirts, School Dress Shirts, School White Shirts, School Uniform Trousers, School Uniforms, Uniform Tracksuits, School Uniform Sweaters, School House Uniforms and School Uniform T-Shirts.

Our Product Range: Uniform Tracksuits School Uniform Sweaters School House Uniforms School Uniform T-Shirts

Quality: We are a quality-conscious company that has made its mark in the industrial sector by providing high quality Uniform Blazers, School Trousers, School Uniform and School Uniform Shirts to the clients at minimal prices. We ensure that our products go through different rounds of quality testing before their deliverance.

Infrastructure: We are equipped with world class infrastructure which is supported by all modern equipment and requisite which help in manufacturing and supplying products of best quality. Our infrastructure gives us an edge over our competitors in manufacturing superior products.

Vendor Base: Our vendors have always provided us complete support in achieving our aim of rendering high quality products to the clients. Our procuring agents select such vendors who have a good track record and are willing to serve the clients with full dedication.
